plot: 1) &"Alibi&" (&"Alibi&") While celebrating the seventh anniversary of marriage in a hotel in Casablanca, Morocco, Gianni convinces his wife Gianni to do a threesome with the room servant Ali. 2) &"Double Trouble&" (&"Dupla Confusão&") While playing tennis with Bruno, Stefania has intercourse with him in the bathroom. Meanwhile, Bruno's wife Erika does with Stefania's husband Luigi in his office, to get the position of guest in a talk show. 3) &"Two Hearts and a Hut&" (&"Dois Corações e Uma Cabana&") The maid Katarina is tipped with a high amount and prostitutes with a couple of sadistic & masochistic. 4) &"Jolly Bangs&" (&"Casos&") While on the beach, Raffaella fantasizes erotic affairs to the satisfaction of her husband Ugo. 5) &"Honni Soit Qui Mal y Pense&" (&"Que a Maldade Fique com Aquele que Pensa Maldade&") The photographer Franco wishes to have anal sex with Anna, who tells him that he can do only after marrying her. When they are invited to a party, she loses her virginity. 6) &"Call me Pig, Cause I Like It!&" (&"Chama-me de Porca, Porque Eu Gosto!&") While in London in their honeymoon, Rosy and Oskar disclose the real intentions of a voyeur.   Written by  Claudio Carvalho, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
title: Fallo!
